                                        User.UserCategory category,
                                        float workPercentage,
                                        int deptId)
        Creates new user in the database
        Parameters:
        firstName - - String first name
        lastName - - String last name
        email - - String email
        phone - - String phone number
        category - - UserCategory category Values: 0: Admin, 1: Nurse, 2: Healthworker, 3: Assistant
        workPercentage - - Float: percentage of work (0 to 1)
        deptId - - ID of department
        Returns:
        Object[] - array with user
